attributes.comment:
Thank you very much for requesting feedback on your proposed rate increase.
As a parent who is waiting to adopt a child, who will need to re-submit an I171H
again due to the extremely long wait until child match, I am not pleased with the
proposed rate increase.

I do not understand the need to reapply in the first place, since I was already
approved. I believe the validity time should be increased to 18 months or 2 years.
(Simply re-run the fingerprints already taken to verify the parents? legal history.)
The rate increase makes the situation even more difficult for adopting parents.
Not only are we having to re-do the paperwork, and take time off of work to get re-
fingerprinted, but now we may be required to pay even more then the original rate.

Please, please, take into consideration the financial situation of adopting parents.
We greatly desire to take a child with no family into our home and raise the child
as our own treasured son or daughter. Please do not make this process even
more difficult for us.

Thank you very much for your consideration.
Sincerely,
Jennifer L. Henrikson
attributes.title: Comment Submitted By Jennifer L. Henrikson
